# Keyboard shortcuts

## Braille spezial

`chord Dot 1 bis 6` :  blinkender Cursor  
`chord Dot 4 bis 5` :  Tab  


## Unix Shell

`strg + r` :  suche  
`strg + g` :  suche abbrechen  
`strg + c` :  abbrechen  
`strg + u` :  clear characters left of cursor  
`strg + w` :  delete word left of cursor  
`strg + l` :   clear screen  
`strg + y` :  paste last cut or deleted text  
`strg + a` :  pos1  
`strg + e` :  end of line  
`strg + xx` : move between start of command line and current cursor position (and back again)  
`Alt + b` : move backward one word (or go to start of word the cursor is currently on)  
`Alt + f` : move forward one word (or go to end of word the cursor is currently on)
